title: The cooperative effect of Co and CoO in Co/CoO enabled efficient catalytic hydrogenation and demethoxylation of guaiacol to cyclohexanol
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2153-2166
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00183D, Paper
Bhupendra Pratap Singh, Ganesh Sunil More, Rajaram Bal, Rajendra Srivastava
Guaiacol, a key building block of lignin, which is the intricate glue that holds biomass, was transformed into cyclohexanol, an industrial chemical used as a solvent, nylon precursor, and plasticizer over a Co/CoO catalyst.
